duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop product plans with clear, measurable success criteria.
Define mechanisms and metrics for product/feature adoption, performance, and variance against goals.
Work closely with cross-functional teams and help define the technical approach to provide the best solutions.
Understand the architecture of the systems and technologies behind the publishing pipeline.
Build and cultivate relationships with stakeholders, manage expectations, and influence technical priorities and business strategy.
Use data to drive product decisions, targeting metrics for success, and measuring results against them.

education_certification.credential: BS in engineering, computer science, or similar discipline. MBA or master’s degree preferred.
